TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TokenReplayCache extends System.Object implements class System.IdentityModel.Configuration.ICustomIdentityConfiguration
Public MustInherit Class TokenReplayCache Implements ICustomIdentityConfiguration

summary.span: 定义用于检测重播标记的缓存的方法的抽象基类。

span.span: The abstract base class that defines methods for a cache used to detect replayed tokens.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现时，缓存应按计划的时间间隔清除令牌。When implemented, the cache should purge tokens on a scheduled time interval. 方法将安全令牌与密钥和过期时间相关联。The method associates a security token with a key and an expiration time. 可用于在缓存中搜索令牌或删除缓存中的令牌。The can be used to search the cache for the token or to remove the token from the cache. 过期时间指示应从缓存中清除令牌的时间。The expiration time indicates the time at which the token should be purged from the cache.
